name: Professional Performance
overview:
Professional Performance was founded with the simple idea of revolutionizing how mobile HealthCare works to improve the lives of practitioners and their patients.We aim to empower HealthCare organizations of all sizes with the tools to streamline and improve their patient care.

Designed specifically for remote care providers in the field, ProHEALTH is accessible anytime and anywhere enabling care providers to instantly access scheduling, manage patient records, and input patient paperwork right from the point-of-care, while ensuring care firms have real-time communication, coordination, and transparency with their remote workforce.

ProHEALTH is a simple, innovative, and secure EHR platform to be at the heart of a healthcare provider’s IT structure. proHEALTH empowers organizations to better collaborate with their mobile workforce in the field, to make smarter decisions and to improve the quality of care.
